verbs.description: [ARG0: removal of portrait from noble and greenough exhibit] [V: sparks] [ARG1: controversy conversation] [ARGM-LOC: in an exhibit of 100 portraits at the noble and greenough school in dedham] are blank spaces where two small canvases used to be on oct 5 school officials removed one portrait and the text that accompanied it noble nayda a cuevas noble and greenough school school catherine hall nobles and greenough school puerto rican puerto ricans puerto rico nayda a cuevas
